question_name.english: What is the commercial unit of electrical energy?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत ऊर्जा की व्यावसायिक इकाई क्या है?

question_name.english: Which safety device is based on the heating effect of current?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत धारा के तापीय प्रभाव पर कौन सा सुरक्षा उपकरण आधारित है?

question_name.english: Resistance of a conductor increases with:
question_name.hindi: चालक का प्रतिरोध बढ़ता है जब:

question_name.english: Energy consumed by a 1000W heater in 2 hours:
question_name.hindi: 1000W हीटर द्वारा 2 घंटे में खपत ऊर्जा:

question_name.english: Power rating of a 220V iron drawing 2A current:
question_name.hindi: 220V इस्तरी जो 2A धारा लेती है, की शक्ति:

question_name.english: Which meter is connected in series?
question_name.hindi: कौन सा मीटर श्रेणी में जुड़ा होता है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='150' cy='75' r='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='145' y='80'>A</text><line x1='80' y1='75' x2='130' y2='75' stroke='black'/><line x1='170' y1='75' x2='220' y2='75' stroke='black'/></svg>

question_name.english: Current through R₂ in a parallel circuit (R₁=R₂, Total current=5A):
question_name.hindi: समानांतर सर्किट में R₂ से धारा (R₁=R₂, कुल धारा=5A):

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='250' y2='30' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='50' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='90' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='110' y='65'>R₁</text><text x='110' y='105'>R₂</text><text x='30' y='75'>5A</text></svg>

question_name.english: A heating element draws 5A at 220V. New power at 110V?
question_name.hindi: 220V पर 5A धारा खींचने वाले हीटर का 110V पर नई शक्ति:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect x='120' y='60' width='60' height='30' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='125' y='80'>R</text><line x1='80' y1='75' x2='120' y2='75' stroke='black'/><line x1='180' y1='75' x2='220' y2='75' stroke='black'/><text x='90' y='60'>220V→110V</text><text x='190' y='60'>5A</text></svg>

question_name.english: Equivalent resistance between A and B (6Ω, 6Ω, 12Ω):
question_name.hindi: A और B के बीच तुल्य प्रतिरोध (6Ω, 6Ω, 12Ω):

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='50' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='40' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='80' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='180' y='60' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='110' y='55'>6Ω</text><text x='110' y='95'>6Ω</text><text x='190' y='75'>12Ω</text><text x='40' y='45'>A</text><text x='260' y='45'>B</text></svg>
